value_dict.2 in 1 Convertible: A laptop that can be converted into a tablet.
value_dict.Workstation: A high-performance laptop designed for professional use.

Ram.description: The amount of RAM in the laptop (in GB).

Weight.description: The weight of the laptop (in kg).

TouchScreen.description: Whether the laptop has a touchscreen (1 for yes, 0 for no).

value_dict.0: The laptop does not have a touchscreen.

Ips.description: Whether the laptop has an IPS display (1 for yes, 0 for no).

value_dict.1: The laptop has an IPS display.
value_dict.0: The laptop does not have an IPS display.

Ppi.description: The pixel density of the laptop's screen (in pixels per inch).

Cpu_brand.description: The brand of the laptop's CPU.

value_dict.Intel Core i5: The laptop has an Intel Core i5 processor.
value_dict.Intel Core i7: The laptop has an Intel Core i7 processor.
value_dict.AMD Processor: The laptop has an AMD processor.
value_dict.Intel Core i3: The laptop has an Intel Core i3 processor.
value_dict.Other Intel Processor: The laptop has another type of Intel processor.

HDD.description: The size of the laptop's hard disk drive (in GB).

SSD.description: The size of the laptop's solid state drive (in GB).

Gpu_brand.description: The brand of the laptop's GPU.

value_dict.Intel: The laptop has an Intel GPU.
value_dict.AMD: The laptop has an AMD GPU.
value_dict.Nvidia: The laptop has a Nvidia GPU.

Os.description: The operating system of the laptop.

value_dict.Others: The laptop runs on another operating system.
